title: Victims, suspect identified in fatal shooting in Colorado Springs
content:
Two children and two adults were found dead inside a home at El Morro Mobile Estates in Colorado Springs Tuesday night, according to police.
Autopsies revealed that the three victims, identified as 26-year-old Lucero Badillo’ Castillo, 5-year-old Laela Barcenas’ Badillo, and 8-year-old Rodolfo Barcenas’ Badillo, Jr., were shot to death. The manner of death has been ruled a homicide.
The suspect, identified as 29-year-old Rodolfo Barcenas’ Alcantara of Colorado Springs, also died of a gunshot wound, but the manner of death has been ruled a suicide.
These are the second, third, and fourth homicides of 2017 in Colorado Springs.
It's unclear how the four people are related, but police say there is no danger to the public at the time. An investigation is ongoing.
